text.start_msg:
Hello, my name is Alex! I'm your personal assistant from the Sales Solution team. I can answer your questions and provide information about our services. I can give a brief description of each service, provide examples of our clients' successes, and talk about our approach to work. Additionally, if you have specific needs or problems, I can help you determine which of our services may be most useful for your business. However, for complex questions or detailed consultations, I may recommend reaching out to our manager for additional information.

What is your name?
text.choose_lang_ok: The language is set to Russian!
text.noName: No problem, you can remain incognito. Can you briefly tell me what brought you here?
text.tellAboutService: Which specific services are you interested in?
text.freeAdvice: I'm always at your service, ask me a question:
text.writeMe: Nice to meet you, {}! Tell me in a few words, what brought you here?
text.getServices: Write down which services you are interested in:

buts.noName: I don't want to tell my name
buts.writeProblem: I wanted to ask about... [describe the problem]
